name: Cloak of Displacement, Major
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Cloak of Displacement/Major

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, Extend Spell, displacement

sections.body: This item appears to be a normal cloak, but on command its magical properties distort and warp light waves. This displacement works just like the displacement spell and lasts for a total of 15 rounds per day, which the wearer can divide up as she sees fit.
